message: Let's start with a reasonable split, Bob. Accept and we can finish the game early.
You're being too generous, Alice. I'll take a fair share.
I'm not being too generous, I'm being realistic. Take it or leave it.
You're not being realistic, Alice. I'm making a more balanced offer.
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but don't think you're getting the better deal.
I'm not desperate, I'm just being strategic. You're not getting the better deal here.
You're pushing your luck, Bob. I'm not going to let you walk all over me.
I'm not walking away, Alice. You're the one who's going to have to make the next move.
You're getting greedy, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but that's as far as I'll go.
I'm not budging, Alice. You're the one who's going to have to accept my terms now.
You're not getting the whole pie, Bob. It's time to share.
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or leave it.
